title: To do
text: Add news Add cran comments Add funding Logo Update readme Update license Add pkgdown Add github actions Add codecov

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jones L (2025). datachangelog: Evaluate Log Changes Data Records. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://edith-nerc.github.io/datachangelog/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {datachangelog: Evaluate and Log Changes in Data Records},   author = {Lewis A. Jones},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://edith-nerc.github.io/datachangelog/}, }

what: Evaluate and Log Changes in Data Records
title: Evaluate and Log Changes in Data Records
text: development version datachangelog can installed via GitHub using:

what: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
text: function evaluate log changes data records two dataframes optionally create markdown changelog.

title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
code: changelog(   x,   y,   by = "column",   report = FALSE,   file = "CHANGELOG.md",   author = NULL,   date = NULL,   ver = NULL )

title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
text: x data.frame. data.frame compare y. Treated original version data records. y data.frame. data.frame compare x. Treated replacement version data records. character. x y compared? Options include "column" (default) "row". report logical. TRUE, verbose report written file. file character. Path, name, extension file saved. Defaults current working directory "CHANGELOG.md". author character. author report changelog report, requested. date character. data report changelog report, requested. default, current date used. ver character. version number report changelog report, requested.

title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
text: data.frame containing data record comparison results. changes reported. report TRUE, changelog report also saved file.

title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog
text: function assumes input data.frames maintain structure aims evaluate whether existing record values changed (e.g. data cleaning).

title: Evaluate and log changes in data records — changelog

title: datachangelog: Evaluate and Log Changes in Data Records — datachangelog-package
text: Provides functionality evaluating logging changes data records datasets. aim package provide lightweight convenient option sharing changes data records (e.g. due data cleaning efforts).
